properties.areaDesc: Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 1 at 9:02PM PST until March 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to
45 mph expected.

* WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains, Santa Clarita Valley and San
Fernando Valley.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to noon PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Major roadways that could be impacted by
the gusty winds include Interstates 5 and 405, as well well as
Highways 14 and 118.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO NOON PST TUESDAY
